info.author: Noam Raphael
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: University of Illinois/NCSA Open Source License
info.description:
IDLE can hang if very long output is printed. To avoid this, the Squeezer
extensions catches any output longer than 80 lines of text (configurable) and
displays a rectangular box instead:

* Double-clicking the box will "expand" it - replace it with the original text
* Middle-clicking the box will copy the text to the clipboard/selection
* Right-clicking the box will open the text in a text viewer (e.g. Notepad,
platform dependant)

These instructions appear on the box itself, along with the length of the
"squeezed" text, making this extension very intuitive to use.
info.name: Squeezer
info.summary: IDLE extesion: catches long output to keep IDLE alive
info.html_description:
IDLE can hang if very long output is printed. To avoid this, the Squeezer
extensions catches any output longer than 80 lines of text (configurable) and
displays a rectangular box instead:

* Double-clicking the box will "expand" it - replace it with the original text
* Middle-clicking the box will copy the text to the clipboard/selection
* Right-clicking the box will open the text in a text viewer (e.g. Notepad,
platform dependant)

These instructions appear on the box itself, along with the length of the
"squeezed" text, making this extension very intuitive to use.
